values: A stereotype is a general but often incorrect idea about a person or thing.
There’s a stereotype that pigs are dirty animals. But they are rather clean.
n. 陈腔滥调，老套；铅版 vt. 使用铅版；套用老套，使一成不变
n. 老套, 模式化的见解, 有老一套固定想法的人
vt. 把…模式化, 使成陈规
时态:stereotyped, stereotyping, stereotypes名 词:stereotyper
